Sure, I'm happy to help you plan your home page in more detail. Here's an example of how you could structure your home page into multiple sections:

1. Header: The header should include your company's logo, navigation menu, and a call-to-action button to encourage visitors to take a specific action on your website.
2. Hero Section: This section should feature a large, attention-grabbing image or video with a strong headline and subheadline that clearly communicates your company's value proposition.
3. About Us: In this section, you can provide a brief overview of your company's history, mission, and values, as well as highlight any notable achievements or partnerships.
4. Services: This section should showcase the digital services that your company provides, with a brief description of each service and a call-to-action button that encourages visitors to learn more.
5. Portfolio: This section should feature a selection of your best work, with visually appealing images or videos and a brief description of each project.
6. Testimonials: In this section, you can include testimonials from satisfied clients to build trust and credibility with potential customers.
7. Blog: If you have a blog, this section should feature your latest posts, with a brief summary of each post and a call-to-action button that encourages visitors to read more.
8. Call-to-Action: This section should include a clear call-to-action that encourages visitors to take a specific action, such as contacting your company, scheduling a consultation, or signing up for a newsletter.
9. Contact Us: Finally, this section should include your contact information, such as your email address, phone number, and physical address, as well as a contact form that visitors can use to send you a message directly.

Here are some additional tips for each section:

* In the hero section, make sure to use a high-quality image or video that grabs the visitor's attention and clearly communicates your company's value proposition.
* In the about us section, focus on what makes your company unique and what sets you apart from other digital agencies.
* In the services section, provide a brief overview of each service and highlight the benefits of working with your company.
* In the portfolio section, choose a selection of projects that showcase your expertise and experience in the digital marketing industry.
* In the testimonials section, use quotes from real clients to build trust and credibility with potential customers.
* In the call-to-action section, make sure to use clear and compelling language that encourages visitors to take action.
* In the contact us section, provide multiple ways for visitors to get in touch with you, and make it easy for them to do so.

I hope this helps you plan your home page effectively. Good luck with your website development!
